snippet.title: ARID - Early Access Launch Trailer
snippet.description:
Arid is a single-player Open World survival experience that challenges players in surviving the most arid place in the world: The Atacama.

This is a project made by students from Breda University. You can get the game for free, on Steam: https://store.steampowered.com/app/1463730/Arid/

Join us on Discord: https://discord.gg/3hNJeNUVHj
